[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.1 Purpose: The Education Diploma System (EDS) defines requirements for diploma validation, eligibility verification, jury evaluations, and issuance.
[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.2 Scope: EDS supports candidate applications, jury reviews, validation, and issuance notifications.

[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.1 System Interfaces: EDS integrates with Academy databases for application tracking and jury coordination.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.2 User Interfaces: EDS provides web interfaces for candidates, inspectors, and jury members.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.3 Hardware Interfaces: EDS supports standard computing devices for submissions and validation.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.4 Software Interfaces: EDS uses PostgreSQL for storage  REST APIs for diploma validation.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.5 Communications Interfa: EDS secures candidate communications via TLS encryption.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.6 Memory Constraints: EDS optimizes memory for candidate records and validation history.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.8 Site Adaptation Requir: EDS is configurable for multiple institutions and diploma types.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.9 Interfaces with Servic: EDS links with notification systems for application updates.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.7 MISSING-TAG2: EDS manages validation scheduling  jury evaluations  decision notifications.

[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.4 Product Functions: EDS manages applications  validation  jury scheduling  diploma issuance.
[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.6 Limitations: Requires internet access for submissions and jury coordination.
[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.7 Assumptions and Dependencie: EDS relies on Academy records  jury schedules  diploma verification procedures.
[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.5 MISSING-TAG1: Designed for candidates  Academy inspectors  jury members.

[SUBSEC] 2.1 External Interfaces.REQ-INTF-001: The system shall integrate with Academy databases to process candidate applications.
[SUBSEC] 2.1 External Interfaces.REQ-INTF-002: The system shall allow inspectors to verify eligibility and review applications.

[SUBSEC] 2.2 Functions.REQ-FUNC-001: The system shall allow candidates to submit applications  including personal details  experience  diploma requests (REQ-DB-001).
[SUBSEC] 2.2 Functions.REQ-FUNC-002: The system shall track applications  assign numbers  allow inspectors to verify eligibility  accepting or rejecting candidates (REQ-DB-001  REQ-INTF-002).
[SUBSEC] 2.2 Functions.REQ-FUNC-003: The system shall provide candidates with real-time application status updates and notifications (REQ-DB-001).
[SUBSEC] 2.2 Functions.REQ-FUNC-004: The system shall schedule jury evaluations  notify candidates and jury members  record decisions  issuing diplomas or rejections (REQ-DB-002  REQ-DB-003).

[SUBSEC] 2.3 Usability Requirements.REQ-USAB-001: The system shall provide a dashboard for candidates to track application status and updates.

[SUBSEC] 2.5 Logical Database Requiremen.REQ-DB-001: The system shall securely store candidate details  application status  eligibility decisions.
[SUBSEC] 2.5 Logical Database Requiremen.REQ-DB-002: The system shall store jury schedules  evaluation results  diploma issuance records.

[SUBSEC] 2.6 Design Constraints.REQ-DSGN-001: The system shall generate unique tracking IDs for applications.

[SUBSEC] 2.7 Standards Compliance.REQ-COMP-001: The system shall comply with education data security regulations.

[SUBSEC] 2.8 Software System Attributes.REQ-ATTR-001: The system shall log application submissions  jury evaluations  diploma issuances.

[SUBSEC] 2.4 MISSING-TAG3.REQ-PERF-001: The system shall process candidate applications within 5 seconds.

[SEC] 3. Verification: Tests application processing  eligibility verification  jury evaluations  diploma issuance.
[SEC] 4. Supporting Information: User guides  API documentation  validation manuals  compliance requirements.
[SEC] 5. References: Education validation policies  Academy guidelines  diploma issuance standards.
